sql.id: select dutyid as id, dutycode as code, dutyname as name from t_duty <<where dutyid=#id#>> <<and dutycode=#code#>> <<and dutyname like #name#>> {order by dutyid=#idSort#, dutycode=#codeSort#, dutyname=#nameSort#}
select dutyid as id from t_duty <<where dutyid=#id#>> <<and dutycode=#code#>> <<and dutyname like #name#>> {order by dutyid=#idSort#, dutycode=#codeSort#, dutyname=#nameSort#}
